headlines.description: Tottenham's eight-month long wait for a Premier League away win continued after a controversial 2-1 loss at Leicester.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs lose at Leicester after more VAR drama

headlines.description: Burnley striker Chris Wood scored a superb first-half brace to help them outclass promoted Norwich City 2-0 at Turf Moor.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wood scores twice as Burnley bring Norwich crashing down

headlines.description: A first-half own goal by Yerry Mina and a late Lys Mousset effort gave Sheffield United a smash-and-grab 2-0 win at Everton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sheffield United secure surprise win at Everton

headlines.description: A Bernardo Silva hat trick helped Man City to secure the joint second-biggest Premier League victory in history with an 8-0 thrashing of Watford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Silva hat trick as Man City beat Watford 8-0

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Newcastle United

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion did everything right except score a goal in a 0-0 Premier League draw at Newcastle United on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton fail to ignite in goalless draw at Newcastle
